snippet.title: Lust for Darkness - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
STEAM GREENLIGHT: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=931364079
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/LustForDarknessHorror/
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/LustForDarkness?lang=pl

A psychological horror of seeking satisfaction on the border of two intertwining worlds. 
An intruguing plot with erotic and occult themes guides the player's character through the Yelvertones' victorian mansion and a perverse land inspired with Lovecraft's works and paintings of Zdzisław Beksiński.

Trailer music by PMme studio: Paweł Pietruszewski & Miłosz Markiewicz
